body.name: O’Bright LED Cylinder Floor Lamp with Remote Control, Full Range Dimming, Adjustable Color Temperature 3000K-6000K, Minimalist Standing Lamps for Living Room, Bedrooms and Office, Antique Brass
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 3 hrs 48 mins
features: 360 Degree Cylindrical Led Bulb - The contemporary standing lamp is built-in a high-efficient cylindrical led bulb delivering a 360° non-dead-ends lighting with Max.1500 Lumens of brightness (equal to 150W incandescent bulbs). The LED has a comfortable soft light (Color Temperature: 3000K-warm white to 6000K-cool white). It provides a comfortable & adjustable lighting range for home or office.

Magnetic Remote control - Control the lamp from across the room with the new RF remote control! Adjust the color temperature from 3000K to 6000K. Set a 1- minute power down cycle or use the brightness presets to your liking. Attach the magnetic remote to the pole or any metal surface for safe keeping. Last but not least, the remote can be paired to multiple lamps if you want to control all lights via only one remote control. Customize to fit your needs!

Full Range Dimming - The led floor lamp has a built-in touch dimmer switch with a full range of adjustable brightness from 10% to 100%. Tap the switch button to turn the light on/off. Long press the dimmer switch to brighten or dim the light. You can change the brightness to a soft setting for mood light, night light or adjust to the highest setting when you want to light up the entire room.

Smart Plug Compatibility with Memory Function - The standing light is fully compatible with wall switch, timer and smart plugs. The light will be on/off instantly when you control the light via wall switch or smart plug. Plus, the advanced smart dimmer is equipped with memory function. You can preset the light to your desired brightness. The light will always be on your last setting when you turn it on next time. Upgrade your old standing lamps today!

Minimalist Design – This redesigned minimalist standing lamp is easy to tuck away in tight corners, next to your sofa, bedside or even in your home office or sitting room. Achieve the luxury look with the sleek design and accessibility of this lamp. Entertaining guests? No problem, adjust the lighting to the mood of the room with the remote control, attach the magnetic remote on the lamp itself or any metal surface when not in use.
body.description: O'Bright LED Cylinder Floor Lamp with Remote Control Remote Control, Full Range Dimming, Adjustable Color Temperature This standing lamp has a cylindrical LED bulb providing 360° of uninterrupted lighting. The Remote control allows you to operate several lamps within an 80-ft range. Use the remote to change the color temperature, set a 1-minute power timer or adjust the light to your desired brightness with the full range dimmer. Store the remote directly on the lamp pole or on a metal surface. Smart plug compatibility and Memory Function make the cylinder floor lamp a seamless addition to your home décor. LED Brightness: 1500 Lumens (Max.) Color Temperature: 3000K to 6000K Dimmable: Full Range Dimming (20% - 100%) Remote Control: Up to 80 feet Works with Wall Switch, Timer and Smart Plug Total Height: 66 inches Power Cord: 6 feet

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Brilliant Floor Lamp
reviews.reviewText: Began search looking for a led floor lamp. Got hookedon that large curved all in a single row wand. No 'fixture'on its end. Reading many negative Comments steeredme away, even though the design is extremely attractive.Finding this torchiere in the lamp forest was pure luck!!The picture of the top of the O'Bright floor lamp showsthe white led clear plastic side. We'd be lighting up theceiling which you entirely might wish.Other side of slotted disk is flat black like the base rest,and normally seen when the lamp is positioned for use.O'Bright OB-FL01D -- attracted to the dual equallyproportioned disks at base and at top a really innovative,thoroly modern, slotted disk lamp at top of an extremelyslender pole. The nearly 5-star comment rating hereconvioncved me to order ! OK:The first thing to notice is that the heavy base is shippedin the most amazing papiermache sculpture imaginable.Looks like a game of tunnels, towers and trolls, if therewas such a game.It is pretty easy to figure out how it goes together. Fourtubes screw together without a seam, pole looks one piece.Worry about the wire twisting too much inside whilescrewing the four pieces together.I've bought two, the second one, I 'counter-wound' wiresa couple turns before assembling... probably makes nodifference. Really like the minimalist disk design, skinnyblack pole, with the slotted torch centered at the top.You like the design, or don't. It's industrial art, but it'snot, It might even have a personality. At first touch, thenon-switch, no remote, and instant blast of light ismarvelous. Switch is not down at the floor but exactlyat the right height on the column, Touch it again, it dims.third caress turns the lamp into mood lighting. LEDarray at full blast is like daylight suddenly happened,natural, not blue or incandescent yellow. A slender 7'black cord with a simple connect to a short tail comingout of the pole about 2'' above the base, It connects toa tidy black transformer that plugs into the house duplex.Design allows full access to the second socket.Got a couple more...Now, on the fourth lamp. With its 66" height and 10" DLED array that at full bore will light up a whole wall, halfa room-- and do it not at table lamp height, not from aceiling light, but at a new 270 degree interactive personheight, which is new in my digs.Consider the lamp almost anonymous, it's a source ratherthan a thing. With its, could be a little longer, cord andeasy weight, pick it up, move it close to a table, behind acouch, point the cool to touch magic disk exactly, and you,on the column, with a gentle how-do-you-do make it goaway -- or blast like a shaft of sunlight thru a window.Everything seems right. It deserves an award. EbbPS: Had a switch go bad, sent a USP return label, newtorchiere arrived almost at the same time I droppedthe return at the store. Like immediate.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Check color before you put it together and expect assembly to be a little tricky.
reviews.reviewText: I went back and forth trying to decide whether to order black or silver. Decided on silver. Lamp came and was black. Thought I must be remembering it wrong. Finally checked. I did not order it wrong. They sent the wrong color. The order was for silver and they sent me black. Called and they said to use Amazon's return policy but honestly after assembling it, deciding on the slant that would work best for the lamp's top, and getting it situated where I wanted it, that did not seem worth it.And the black does look a lot better than I thought it would.It is bright and it does look attractive in my opinion, but then I like modern style furniture.Assembly ... after the first instruction ... was straight forward. The first instruction tells you to connect the power part but there is no picture that has a power part labelled. My first guess was the power cord that plugs into the wall. Wrong. That is not what they meant. They meant the power cord that connects the bulbs with the pole. Also, they did not say how to connect it. I just connected it. Wrong again. You need to slide the power cord through the separate top part of the pole and then connect it. After figuring out that, the rest of the assembly was straight forward and easy.One last item ... they say the lamp may have a delay if it is connected to a smart device. I did not realize a plug that is controlled by an ordinary wall switch was considered a smart device. I emailed and was told that yes, if you want to connect the lamp to an on/off switch, there will be a delay of from 2 - 3 seconds before the lamp actually turns on and you get light in the room. That can feel pretty weird and does not help you see in the dark. You'll need some other light source in the room that you can use for the 2 - 3 seconds, or stand still waiting until the lamp lights up and you can see where you are going.Hope that helps.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Faulty product. It gives beautiful light and is a plus for minimalist decor however it is faulty in many ways. Hope this manufacturer can upgrade the product. If so then worth the money for sure. Primarily faulty with all the electronical components from touch on and off button to plug and remote. Sad to say.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Bought 2. One was faulty. Replacement seems fine
reviews.reviewText: I love the lamps… they’re perfect for me but 1 of the 2 I bought was faulty and flashed every couple minutes… the replacement seems fine and I am happy with the light levels… havent experienced them being too bright or watever some people complained about. The remotes are cheap and if you plan on running these in different rooms be ready to have one remote turn them all on from what I can gather. When you sync a remote it will sync to all available lights and control them all. For me it’s not a problem because I only used the remote to set the warmth and brightness. I turn them on via voice through google assistant and they save the last setting which is awesome. I’m happy and hope they don’t start tweaking out like others complained. They are streamlined, sleek lamps and I am super happy with the look and tiny footprint.
Excelente producto, muy bonita la lampara, base pesada, luz calida y fria en diferentes intensidades, control remoto, luz led. Yo me imagino que la luz no es reemplazable.

reviews.reviewTitle: Terrible product: the product does not clock over 2400LM, very low brightness
reviews.reviewText: This product stands above all others in terms of price. I chose it over its false claim that it will go up to 3000. It only clocks 2400LMs.Edit: Previously, I mistakenly put in 1400. This was inaccurate; it clocks between 2300-2400.
Easy to assemble, easy to change light levelsEasy to change direction of light ..downward for tasks , Upward off ceiling to give diffuse general light .Or at wall to highlight an area .

The assembly is easy but the parts didn't fit together. The threads on one of the pieces to be screwed together to make the stand were too small so it couldn't be assembled. The dimmable portion was very cheaply made.
